LandingPage.description: A Browser Extension for searching tabs, bookmarks, and history, with support for fuzzy Pinyin search.

1.title: Smart Pinyin Search
1.description: Supports Chinese/English hybrid search with 20,000+ pinyin library

2.title: Multi-source Integration
2.description: Simultaneous search across tabs, history and bookmarks

3.title: Keyboard Navigation
3.description: Full keyboard support with arrow keys selection and Enter to navigate

footer.description: Supercharge your browsing experience with Blazwitcher.
